steps.title: Five Weeks of Mastery
steps.narration: Five intensive weeks of learning have transformed how you work. You've built skills that make you ten times more effective with AI. Let's review what you can now do.

steps.title: Rapid Acquisition
steps.narration: You can master any codebase in hours, not weeks. You know how to give AI context, verify its understanding, and generate documentation that accelerates your entire team.

steps.title: System Debugging
steps.narration: Distributed system issues no longer intimidate you. You gather the right context, generate hypotheses with AI, and systematically investigate until you find the root cause.

steps.title: Platform Strategy
steps.narration: You design integration patterns that scale. You know when to use each pattern, how to generate compliant code, and how to verify AI output meets your standards.

steps.title: AI-Augmented Design
steps.narration: You design systems faster without sacrificing quality. AI accelerates your process while your judgment ensures the architecture is sound.

steps.title: You're Amplified
steps.narration: These skills make you genuinely amplified. You give AI the context it needs, verify its output intelligently, and direct it with clear designs. You're not just using AI‚Äîyou're multiplied by it.

steps.title: What's a Playbook?
steps.narration: A playbook is your documented system for how YOU use AI to multiply YOUR impact. It's personal, tested, and continuously improved. This is what separates casual AI users from amplified engineers.

steps.title: Acquisition Protocol
steps.narration: Document your best prompts for learning codebases. Your verification checklist. Documentation templates you generate. Time targets for each phase. This becomes your standard operating procedure.

steps.title: Debugging Workflow
steps.narration: How do you gather information for AI? What are your hypothesis generation prompts? Your investigation framework? Post-incident documentation templates? Write it all down.

steps.title: Design Process
steps.narration: Your requirements synthesis approach. Design generation prompts. Trade-off analysis framework. Review preparation checklist. Each process systematized for consistency and speed.

steps.title: Code Generation Standards
steps.narration: What do you delegate to AI versus do yourself? How do you review AI-generated code? Testing requirements? Common corrections you make? Define your standards clearly.

steps.title: Continuous Improvement
steps.narration: Track what works and what doesn't. Improve your prompts over time. Share learnings with your team. A playbook is never finished‚Äîit evolves as AI capabilities evolve.

steps.title: Measure Your Impact
steps.narration: How do you know your playbook works? Measure before and after. Track time savings, scope expansion, and quality improvements. Data proves amplification is real.

steps.title: Speed Gains
steps.narration: Five times faster codebase onboarding. Three times faster incident resolution. Two times faster design cycles. These aren't aspirational‚Äîthey're achievable with systematic AI use.

steps.title: Scope Expansion
steps.narration: The biggest gain? Taking on projects you couldn't before. Ten times bigger scope becomes possible when AI handles the repetitive work and you focus on judgment calls.

steps.title: Journey Complete
steps.narration: From senior engineer to amplified engineer. You've mastered rapid acquisition, system debugging, platform strategy, and AI-augmented design. You have a playbook that multiplies your impact.

steps.title: The Future Is Yours
steps.narration: The engineers who embrace AI won't just keep their jobs. They'll take on bigger roles, more responsibility, and more impact. You're one of them now. Stay amplified, keep improving, and lead the way!

questions.question: What makes the combination of these skills so powerful with AI?
options: AI does all the work for you
You can give AI context, verify output, and direct with clear designs
You no longer need to understand the code
AI replaces the need for these skills
questions.explanation: Your skills make AI effective. You provide context, verify quality, and direct with clear designs. Without these skills, AI output is generic and unreliable.

questions.question: What does 'rapid acquisition' mean in this context?
options: Mastering codebases in hours instead of weeks
questions.explanation: Rapid acquisition is the skill of quickly understanding and navigating any codebase using AI assistance‚Äîturning weeks of ramp-up into hours.

questions.question: How do these skills relate to each other?
options: You only need one of them
They build on each other and combine for maximum amplification
questions.explanation: The skills compound. Rapid acquisition feeds into debugging. Debugging informs platform strategy. Strategy enables better design. Together, they make you amplified.

questions.question: What is an engineering playbook?
options: Your documented system for using AI to multiply your impact
questions.explanation: A playbook is YOUR personal, tested, documented system for how you use AI. It includes prompts, processes, verification steps, and continuous improvement.

questions.question: Why document your prompts in a library?
options: Because prompts expire after one use
So you can reuse, refine, and share what works
questions.explanation: A prompts library captures what works. You reuse effective prompts, refine them over time, and share with teammates‚Äîcompounding your and your team's effectiveness.

questions.question: Why is continuous improvement part of the playbook?
options: AI capabilities evolve, so your playbook must evolve too
questions.explanation: AI tools improve constantly. What works today might be outdated tomorrow, and new capabilities emerge. Your playbook must evolve to stay amplified.

questions.question: What's the biggest gain from being an amplified engineer?
options: Taking on projects 10x bigger in scope
questions.explanation: The biggest win is scope expansion. When AI handles repetitive work, you can take on projects that would have been impossible before‚Äî10x bigger impact.

questions.question: How should you track amplification?
options: Ask AI how much faster you are
Measure time and effort before vs after on real tasks
questions.explanation: Track real tasks with before/after comparisons. How long would it take without AI? How long did it actually take? What worked well? What needs improvement?

questions.question: What happens to engineers who embrace AI effectively?
options: They stay at the same level
They take on bigger roles, responsibility, and impact
questions.explanation: Amplified engineers don't just keep their jobs‚Äîthey grow. Bigger roles, more responsibility, greater impact. AI is a multiplier for those who master it.
